thread.title: Wind energy subsidy cuts plan defeated in the House of Lords
thread.title_full: Wind energy subsidy cuts plan defeated in the House of Lords - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Wind energy subsidy cuts plan defeated in the House of Lords
text: The Governmentâ€™s plan to end on-shore wind subsidies next year was in doubt after it was defeated in the House of Lords, in a move that could spark further hostilities between David Cameron and peers. The Lords backed a Labour amendment deleting a clause in the Energy Bill that would have ended the renewables obligation in March 2016, a year earlier than planned. Read more
